channel.title: [PI] fire anim not moving?
channel.description: yes ive googled, searched forms,and tuts.. found nothing but people arguing about it.. but my fires are frozen.. not sure how to fix, and yes ive also tried myself and doesnt seem to want to work.. if anybody knows how to fix the glitch plz help :)
